016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.Credential;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.MavenProjectProperties;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.common.PropertyNames;
021import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
022import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
023import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
024
025import javax.inject.Inject;
026import javax.inject.Singleton;
027import java.util.*;
028import java.util.stream.Collectors;
029
030/**
031 * Exposes the Jib plugin configuration so that it can be read by other mojos.
032 *
033 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
034 * @since 1.1
035 */
036@Singleton
037public class JibConfigurationService {
038
039    private static final String IMAGE = "image";
040    private static final String CONTAINER = "container";
041    private static final String WORKING_DIRECTORY = "workingDirectory";
042
043    private Xpp3Dom configuration;
044    private Xpp3Dom to;
045    private Xpp3Dom from;
046
047    @Inject
048    public JibConfigurationService(MavenProject mavenProject) {
049        final Plugin plugin = mavenProject.getPlugin(MavenProjectProperties.PLUGIN_KEY);
050        if (plugin != null && plugin.getConfiguration() != null) {
051            configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
052            to = configuration.getChild("to");
053            from = configuration.getChild("from");
054        }
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * @return the <code>to.image</code> configuration.
059     */
060    public Optional<String> getToImage() {
061        Optional<String> result;
062        String propertyValue = System.getProperties().getProperty(PropertyNames.TO_IMAGE);
063        if (propertyValue != null) {
064            result = Optional.of(propertyValue);
065        } else if (to != null) {
066            result = Optional.ofNullable(to.getChild(IMAGE).getValue());
067        } else {
068            result = Optional.empty();
069        }
070        return result;
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * @return the <code>from.image</code> configuration.
075     */
076    public Optional<String> getFromImage() {
077        Optional<String> result;
078        String propertyValue = System.getProperties().getProperty(PropertyNames.FROM_IMAGE);
079        if (propertyValue != null) {
080            result = Optional.of(propertyValue);
081        } else if (from != null) {
082            result = Optional.ofNullable(from.getChild(IMAGE).getValue());
083        } else {
084            result = Optional.empty();
085        }
086        return result;
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * @return the <code>to.tags</code> configuration.
091     */
092    public Set<String> getTags() {
093        Set<String> result = null;
094        String propertyValue = System.getProperties().getProperty(PropertyNames.TO_TAGS);
095        if (propertyValue != null) {
096            result = new HashSet<>(parseCommaSeparatedList(propertyValue));
097        } else {
098            if (to != null) {
099                Xpp3Dom tags = to.getChild("tags");
100                if (tags != null && tags.getChildCount() > 0) {
101                    result = Arrays.stream(tags.getChildren())
102                            .map(Xpp3Dom::getValue)
103                            .collect(Collectors.toSet());
104                }
105            }
106            if (result == null) {
107                result = Collections.emptySet();
108            }
109        }
110        return result;
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * @return the <code>to.auth.username</code> and <code>to.auth.password</code> configuration.
115     */
116    public Optional<Credential> getToCredentials() {
117        return getCredentials(PropertyNames.TO_AUTH_USERNAME, PropertyNames.TO_AUTH_PASSWORD, to);
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * @return the <code>from.auth.username</code> and <code>from.auth.password</code> configuration.
122     */
123    public Optional<Credential> getFromCredentials() {
124        return getCredentials(PropertyNames.FROM_AUTH_USERNAME, PropertyNames.FROM_AUTH_PASSWORD, from);
125    }
126
127    private Optional<Credential> getCredentials(String usernamePropName, String passwordPropName, Xpp3Dom node) {
128        Optional<Credential> result = Optional.empty();
129        String usernameProp = System.getProperties().getProperty(usernamePropName);
130        String passwordProp = System.getProperties().getProperty(passwordPropName);
131        if (usernameProp != null && passwordProp != null) {
132            result = Optional.of(Credential.from(usernameProp, passwordProp));
133        } else {
134            if (node != null) {
135                Xpp3Dom auth = node.getChild("auth");
136                if (auth != null) {
137                    Xpp3Dom username = auth.getChild("username");
138                    Xpp3Dom password = auth.getChild("password");
139                    if (username != null && password != null) {
140                        result = Optional.of(Credential.from(username.getValue(), password.getValue()));
141                    }
142                }
143            }
144        }
145        return result;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * @return the <code>container.workingDirectory</code> configuration.
150     */
151    public Optional<String> getWorkingDirectory() {
152        if (configuration != null) {
153            Xpp3Dom container = configuration.getChild(CONTAINER);
154            if (container != null && container.getChild(WORKING_DIRECTORY) != null) {
155                return Optional.ofNullable(container.getChild(WORKING_DIRECTORY).getValue());
156            }
157        }
158        return Optional.empty();
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * @return the <code>container.args</code> configuration.
163     */
164    public List<String> getArgs() {
165        List<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
166        if (configuration != null) {
167            Xpp3Dom container = configuration.getChild(CONTAINER);
168            if (container != null) {
169                Xpp3Dom args = container.getChild("args");
170                if (args.getChildCount() > 0) {
171                    for (Xpp3Dom arg : args.getChildren()) {
172                        result.add(arg.getValue());
173                    }
174                } else {
175                    result.add(args.getValue());
176                }
177            }
178        }
179        return result;
180    }
181
182    private static Set<String> parseCommaSeparatedList(String list) {
183        String[] parts = list.split(",");
184        Set<String> items = new HashSet<>(parts.length);
185        for (String part : parts) {
186            items.add(part.trim());
187        }
188        return items;
189    }
190}
